page.title: 05Durie Farm 2
page.content: which cost Mr.Christie a lot of money. Mr.Christie beleives more in natural farming and used the aeroplane only as a last resort.The types of cattle on his farm are Blue Ray cross Charolais,Galloways and Aberdeen Angus Durie Farm uses a careful blend of both chemical and natural fertiliser so that composition of the soil is kept in prime condition. This has enabled the yield per acre to be increased. Ten years ago the average yield per acre for barley was 2 tonnes per acre it has now risen to 3.3 tonnes per acre.
